Summary: i saw two orange orbs in the sky with long firetrails, they were just hovering.
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Florence
There were no other sightings in Florence on or around July 15th 2012
divs: Sighting Detailsi was outside on my back porch talking to my boyfrend when something in the distance caught my attention. when i looked,i saw two orange orbs falling slowly, but they were still way up in the sky, and they both had long firetrtails. it looked almost like a firework does when its falling to the groung. at first i thought it might be shooting stars, until they just stopped in mid-air. and they were side by side, just sittng there. then i seen one would like 'blink' i would say, but it actually i think got smaller because i could still see the light off of the orb but it was tiny, and then would go back to regular size. then one moved just a little bit, like in a tiny circle and it had a tiny firetrail off of it. we stood there in disbelief for about 5 minutes watching this until they both literally disappeared.then right after, we saw a plane in the sky. i know the airport is right there, but i also know that what we saw, wasnt man-made. i am officially a true beliver of aliens after seeing this. i watch the sky sometimes but never see anything. guess i got lucky that night.
